summary: Completed testing of the new Match Detail Page feature. Backend APIs are fully functional, frontend navigation and UI elements work correctly, with one minor standings display issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Standings section not consistently displaying for all matches
ui_bugs.details: Standings API works correctly (tested GET /api/football/standings/CL returns 36 teams), but frontend may need better loading states or error handling for competitions without standings data

passed_tests: Homepage loads with clickable match cards
Match cards navigate to /match/:matchId URLs correctly
Match detail page renders with all required UI elements
Sign-in prompt displays for unauthenticated users
Vote buttons (1/X/2) are present and properly labeled
Team names and competition info display correctly
All backend prediction APIs work correctly
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (17/17 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (minor standings display issue)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix standings section display issue: Either add loading states while standings fetch, or improve error handling when standings data is not available for certain competitions. The backend API works correctly but frontend needs better UX.
